column5: Recently updated condo in the heart of San Antonio. This comfortable one bedroom condo includes an upstairs loft perfect for relaxing or studying; three televisions with amazon firesticks equipped with kodi; new carpet; new refrigerator; new washer/dryer; and new furniture. Conveniently located across from a pool, this is the perfect place to enjoy your time this summer.
column8: Recently Updated Condominium in the Heart of SA
